title: Strengthen neural-symbolic ARC pipeline
description: Implement the roadmap to tighten object-centric representations, DSL-driven reasoning, and evaluation for the hybrid JEPA + HRL system.

title: Integrate object-centric perception and discrete latents
description: Add object parsing, relational graph reasoning, and vector-quantized latent bottlenecks so JEPA embeddings capture crisp symbolic structure.
notes: Object-centric JEPA wrapper added: training/jepa/object_pipeline.py builds token batches and feeds ObjectTokenEncoder; config + tests updated.

title: Define ARC DSL and symbolic enumerator
description: Design a typed DSL for grid transformations, implement interpreter and consistency checks, and wire it into the training stack.

title: Train neural guidance for program search
description: Develop scoring models over DSL programs using JEPA/GNN features, support beam search heuristics, and integrate with the solver loop.

title: Automate option discovery and DSL promotion
description: Build pipelines to discover latent options, validate them against invariants, and register them as new typed primitives with regression tests.

title: Implement few-shot ARC solving pipeline
description: Wire constraint-driven enumeration, caching, and MDL priors to solve ARC tasks from 2-3 examples with the new DSL and neural guidance.

title: Run ARC evaluation and ablation suite
description: Benchmark the full pipeline on synthetic splits and ARC dev set, including ablations for JEPA-only, HRL-only, DSL search, and report solve rates vs compute.
